trait.name: Trampling Charge
text: If the hippopotamus moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the hippopotamus can make one stomp attack against it as a bonus action.

trait.name: Hold Breath
text: The hippopotamus can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 19 (3d8 + 6) piercing damage.

action.name: Stomp
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one prone creature. 22 (3d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.
